result.eng: Mind the gap between the door and the plaform.
result.ga: seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardán
result.orig: Seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardán
result.html: seachain an bhearna idir an doras agus an t-ardánMind the gap between the door and the plaform.
result.ponchtml: seaċain an ḃearna idir an doras agus an t-ardánMind the gap between the door and the plaform.

result.eng: Is the door open?
result.ga: an bhfuil an doras oscailte
result.orig: An bhfuil an doras oscailte
result.html: an bhfuil an doras oscailteIs the door open?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil an doras oscailteIs the door open?

result.eng: He was waiting at the house door.
result.ga: bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.orig: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.html: bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ag fanaċt ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.

result.eng: Press the button to open the door.
result.ga: brúigh an cnaipe chun an doras a oscailt
result.orig: Brúigh an cnaipe chun an doras a oscailt
result.html: brúigh an cnaipe chun an doras a oscailtPress the button to open the door.
result.ponchtml: brúiġ an cnaipe ċun an doras a oscailtPress the button to open the door.

result.eng: He knocked on the door.
result.ga: chnag sé ar an doras
result.orig: Chnag sé ar an doras
result.html: chnag sé ar an dorasHe knocked on the door.
result.ponchtml: ċnag sé ar an dorasHe knocked on the door.

result.eng: Put pressure on the door.
result.ga: cuir brú ar an doras
result.orig: Cuir brú ar an doras
result.html: cuir brú ar an dorasPut pressure on the door.
result.ponchtml: cuir brú ar an dorasPut pressure on the door.

result.eng: Close the door!
result.ga: druid an doras
result.orig: Druid an doras
result.html: druid an dorasClose the door!
result.ponchtml: druid an dorasClose the door!

result.eng: She made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ga: lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.orig: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.html: lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ponchtml: lig sí osna faoisiṁ nuair a ċonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.

result.eng: The door must be locked every night.
result.ga: ní mór an doras a chur faoi ghlas gach oíche
result.orig: Ní mór an doras a chur faoi ghlas gach oíche
result.html: ní mór an doras a chur faoi ghlas gach oícheThe door must be locked every night.
result.ponchtml: ní mór an doras a ċur faoi ġlas gaċ oíċeThe door must be locked every night.

result.eng: Open the door, please.
result.ga: oscail an doras le do thoil
result.orig: Oscail an doras le do thoil
result.html: oscail an doras le do thoilOpen the door, please.
result.ponchtml: oscail an doras le do ṫoilOpen the door, please.

result.eng: There is a notice on the door.
result.ga: tá fógra ar an doras
result.orig: Tá fógra ar an doras
result.html: tá fógra ar an dorasThere is a notice on the door.
result.ponchtml: tá fógra ar an dorasThere is a notice on the door.

result.eng: Is the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ga: an é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.orig: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.html: an é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheisIs the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ponchtml: an é an leiṫreas an ċéad doras ar ḋeisIs the toilet the first door on the right?

result.eng: The second door on the left.
result.ga: an dara doras ar chlé
result.orig: An dara doras ar chlé
result.html: an dara doras ar chléThe second door on the left.
result.ponchtml: an dara doras ar ċléThe second door on the left.

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ga: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.orig: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.html: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ponchtml: tá ballḃrú orm anseo sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: Open the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ga: oscail an doras a thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.orig: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.html: oscail an doras a thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ponchtml: oscail an doras a ṫomáis agus tóg amaċ an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.

result.eng: I need to close the door.
result.ga: caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadh
result.orig: Caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadh
result.html: caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadhI need to close the door.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ mé an doras a ḋúnaḋI need to close the door.

result.eng: I am not able to close the door.
result.ga: níl mé in ann an doras a dhúnadh
result.orig: Níl mé in ann an doras a dhúnadh
result.html: níl mé in ann an doras a dhúnadhI am not able to close the door.
result.ponchtml: níl mé in ann an doras a ḋúnaḋI am not able to close the door.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: d'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.html: d'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág na coṁarsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó ẛinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.

result.eng: They grew up next door to each other.
result.ga: tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iad
result.orig: Tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iad
result.html: tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iadThey grew up next door to each other.
result.ponchtml: tógaḋ sa doras ag a ċéile iadThey grew up next door to each other.

result.eng: They have their guns pointed at the door.
result.ga: tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acu
result.orig: Tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acu
result.html: tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acuThey have their guns pointed at the door.
result.ponchtml: tá na gunnaí aimsiṫe ar an doras acuThey have their guns pointed at the door.
